hero.title: The Codex
hero.description: The living principles, customs, and rhythms that guide life within Mōchirīī.
hero.pill: A shared understanding, not a list of rules.

tenets.title: Tenets
tenets.description: These principles shape how members act, speak, and grow together.
tenets.caption: The Codex reflects how we choose to treat one another, both in and beyond the game.
tenets.note: These tenets are meant to guide behavior naturally, not restrict expression.

items.title: Harmony
items.description: We value balance in conversation, play, and community interaction.

items.title: Generosity
items.description: Support is offered freely, without expectation of return.

items.title: Respect
items.description: Every member is treated with dignity, regardless of rank or experience.

items.title: Presence
items.description: Consistency and reliability matter more than constant activity.

items.title: Craft
items.description: We improve together by sharing knowledge and refining our skills.

items.title: Joy
items.description: Play, curiosity, and light-heartedness are central to the guild spirit.

etiquette.title: Etiquette
etiquette.description: How we interact, resolve conflict, and maintain a welcoming atmosphere.
etiquette.note: When in doubt, choose patience and clarity.

blocks.title: Chat & Tone
items: Assume good intent when misunderstandings arise.

blocks.title: Help & Mentoring
items: Offer help without pressure or judgment.
Ask questions freely and without embarrassment.
Share knowledge in a supportive manner.

blocks.title: Conflict & Resolution
items: Address issues calmly and privately when possible.
Seek mediation if resolution cannot be reached.
Respect final decisions made by leadership.

rhythm.title: Rhythm
rhythm.description: The natural flow of activity within the guild.
rhythm.caption: Mōchirīī values steady engagement over constant intensity.
rhythm.note: Members are encouraged to participate at a pace that suits their lives.

items.title: Events
items.description: Group activities and gatherings announced regularly.

items.title: Raffles
items.description: Occasional rewards and giveaways as a thank-you to active members.

items.title: Updates
items.description: Announcements and changes shared clearly and in advance.

items.title: Quiet Days
items.description: Time for relaxed play, solo progress, or simple conversation.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.description: Growth within the guild is acknowledged through consistent presence and positive contribution.

items.title: Consistency
items.description: Regular participation and dependable presence over time.

items.title: Contribution
items.description: Helping others, sharing knowledge, and supporting guild activities.

items.title: Character
items.description: Maintaining a respectful, thoughtful, and cooperative attitude.

footer.text: The Codex exists to guide, not to bind. It reflects who we strive to be together.
